page.title: 03Shorefields Holiday Village
page.content: {Shorefields Holiday Village}is situated in{Downton Village.}The chalets can accommodate up to six people with a bath, electric kitchen, colour television, and linen provided. The village is open from 1st March to the 1st November. It can take approximately 3,000 people when it's full. About 75,000 people visit{ {Shorefields}every summer. Tourists come mainly from{southern England.} Shorefields employs anything up to 120 people including casual labour.The main amusements are an arcade and a club with entertainment every night and heated swimming pool.They have one big supermarket.For the average family, a week at Shorefields will cost Â£150.Tents and touring caravans are welcome.
